name: Air Canada Partners With... Emirates?
description:
On July 12th, Air Canada announced that they were forming a strategic partnership with Emirates, the flag carrier of the United Arab Emirates.

As part of this agreement, the two carriers “intend to establish a codeshare relationship” later this year, which would allow Air Canada passengers to book connecting flights with Emirates on a single ticket, and vice versa.

This is quite an interesting move for a couple of reasons - let's take a look at it!
